title: Last List Element | Challenge
description: In this challenge, you will write a function to return the last element of a list in Python, demonstrating your understanding of list data structures and accessing list elements.

meta.title: Last List Element: Python Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to access the last element of a list in Python with this engaging coding challenge.
meta.keywords: coding challenge, python, programming tutorial, list, last element
